<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h2 id="2.-Computing-the-Estimated-Points-per-player.">2. Computing the Estimated Points per player.<a class="anchor-link" href="#2.-Computing-the-Estimated-Points-per-player.">¶</a></h2><ul>
<li>The objective function is designed to maximize the summation of estimated points for the fantasy team.</li>
<li>We have access to every player’s historical points, but we still need to compress them into point estimates that reflect each player’s worth.</li>
<li>A simple way to achieve this would be to compute the mean fantasy points accrued by each player over the last 5 matches.</li>
<li><p>However, using an averaging aggregation can be misleading because we would want to capture the recent form of a player more accurately. To achieve this, we shall leverage the weighted averaging technique.</p>
</li>
<li><p>To demonstrate this further, let us consider an example, say, the fantasy points scored by player-1 and player-2 in the last 5 matches are as follows -</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><br/></p>
<p>player-1 - [10, 20 , 30 , 40 , 50] <br/>
player-2 - [50, 40 , 30, 20 , 10] <br/></p>
<ul>
<li>Computing simple averages results in an aggregated score of 30 for both players.</li>
<li>However, the data suggests that player-1 is growing in confidence and has an upward trend in his performance. On the other hand, player-2 has a downward trend in his performance.</li>
<li>By taking a simple average, we are losing an important insight.</li>
<li>If we compute the averages using time decayed weights such that the most recent performance has a higher weight as compared to older performances resulting in an aggregated score of 33.93 and 26.06 for player-1 and player-2, respectively.</li>
<li>As can be seen from the above numbers that even though both the players have amassed the same number of points, the trend in performances is now being captured with player-2 getting a higher average as compared to player-1.</li>
<li>Such subtle differences will help us build a robust model.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="So,-let’s-compute-the-time-decayed-weighted-averages-for-the-eligible-players-in-the-dataset.">So, let’s compute the time decayed weighted averages for the eligible players in the dataset.<a class="anchor-link" href="#So,-let’s-compute-the-time-decayed-weighted-averages-for-the-eligible-players-in-the-dataset.">¶</a></h3>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [7]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="k">def</span> <span class="nf">compute_weighted_points</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">points_vector</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.20</span><span class="p">):</span>
    
    <span class="c1"># compute weights such that recent values are assigned a higher weight as compared to the older values. </span>
    <span class="n">weights</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">exp</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">list</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">reversed</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">points_vector</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">+</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span><span class="o">*</span><span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)))</span>
    <span class="n">exponential_weighted_average</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">average</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">np</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">array</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">points_vector</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">weights</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">weights</span><span class="p">)</span>
    <span class="k">return</span> <span class="n">exponential_weighted_average</span>

<span class="n">processed_player_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'weighted_player_points'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">processed_player_data</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'last_5_matches_points'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">compute_weighted_points</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">processed_player_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">reset_index</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">inplace</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">processed_player_data</span><span class="p">[[</span><span class="s1">'player_name'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'last_5_matches_points'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'weighted_player_points'</span><span class="p">]]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_properties</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'background-color'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'#f7ebcf'</span><span class="p">}))</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Now, let's define the constraints for selecting players as defined by Dream11. These constraints are to be honored by the algorithm while trying to maximize points.
<br/><br/></p>
<p>For more information, check out dream11 <a href="https://www.dream11.com/games/cricket/how-to-play">FAQs</a>.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [15]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Initialize the optimization Problem </span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LpProblem</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Dreamteam'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LpMaximize</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># selection decision variables can be 0 or 1. The number of `selection_decision_varibales` should be equal to </span>
<span class="c1"># the number of players under consideration</span>
<span class="n">selection_decision_variables</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[]</span>

<span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">row</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">processed_player_data</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">itertuples</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">index</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">):</span>
    <span class="n">variable_name</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'x_</span><span class="si">{}</span><span class="s1">'</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">format</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nb">str</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Index</span><span class="p">))</span>
    <span class="n">variable</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">LpVariable</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">variable_name</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">lowBound</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">upBound</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">cat</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Integer'</span> <span class="p">)</span> 
    <span class="n">selection_decision_variables</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">append</span><span class="p">({</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="n">variable</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"player_name"</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">row</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">player_name</span><span class="p">})</span>
 
<span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">selection_decision_variables</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">processed_player_data</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">,</span> 
                                                   <span class="n">on</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"player_name"</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable_name"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">apply</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="k">lambda</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">x</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [17]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># 1 <= n_keeper <= 4 </span>
<span class="n">total_keepers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"player_category_wicket_keeper"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_keepers</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_keepers</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 3 <= n_batsmen <= 6 </span>
<span class="n">total_batsmen</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"player_category_batsman"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_batsmen</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_batsmen</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 1 <= n_allrounders <= 4</span>
<span class="n">total_allrounders</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"player_category_all_rounder"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_allrounders</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_allrounders</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># 3 <= n_bowlers <= 6</span>
<span class="n">total_bowlers</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"player_category_bowler"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_bowlers</span> <span class="o">>=</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_bowlers</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># maximum of 11 players</span>
<span class="n">total_players</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_players</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># maximum fantasy budget of 100</span>
<span class="n">total_cost</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"cost"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_cost</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">100</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="c1"># we cannot pick more than 7 players from the same team</span>
<span class="n">total_team1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"team_name_CSK"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_team1</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="n">total_team2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">lpSum</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"team_name_MI"</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">*</span> <span class="n">selection_decision_variables_df</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s2">"pulp_variable"</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">prob</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">total_team2</span> <span class="o"><=</span> <span class="mi">7</span><span class="p">)</span>



<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">prob</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">prob</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">writeLP</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'Dreamteam.lp'</span><span class="p">)</span>

<span class="k">assert</span> <span class="nb">len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">pulp</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">listSolvers</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">onlyAvailable</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">></span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">"solvers not installed correctly - check - https://www.coin-or.org/PuLP/main/installing_pulp_at_home.html"</span>
<span class="n">prob</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">solve</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">

<div class="inner_cell">
<div class="input_area">
<div class="highlight hl-ipython2"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># prep solution</span>

<span class="n">solutions_df</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DataFrame</span><span class="p">(</span>
    <span class="p">[</span>
        <span class="p">{</span>
            <span class="s1">'pulp_variable_name'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">v</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">name</span><span class="p">,</span> 
            <span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="n">v</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">varValue</span>
        <span class="p">}</span>
        <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">v</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">prob</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">variables</span><span class="p">()</span>
    <span class="p">]</span>
<span class="p">)</span>


<span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">merge</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">merged_processed_player_df</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">solutions_df</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">on</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'pulp_variable_name'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'value'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">==</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">by</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'weighted_player_points'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ascending</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">selected_cols_final</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'player_name'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'team_name_CSK'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'team_name_MI'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'weighted_player_points'</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">final_set_of_players_to_be_selected</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">result</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="n">selected_cols_final</span><span class="p">]</span>

<span class="n">display</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">final_set_of_players_to_be_selected</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">style</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_properties</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="o">**</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'background-color'</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="s1">'#f7ebcf'</span><span class="p">}))</span>

<span class="nb">print</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">"We can accrue an estimated points of </span><span class="si">%f</span><span class="s2">"</span><span class="o">%</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">final_set_of_players_to_be_selected</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'weighted_player_points'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sum</span><span class="p">()))</span>
</pre></div>

<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="There-you-GO-!!-We-have-our-Dream-Team-!!">There you GO !! We have our Dream Team !!<a class="anchor-link" href="#There-you-GO-!!-We-have-our-Dream-Team-!!">¶</a></h3><p>All that needs to be done is to select the team in the app and start earning money !!</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Before we wrap up this tutorial, I would like to highlight the features as well as the enhancement opportunities for the existing algorithm - <br/></p>
<p><strong>a.</strong> The existing algorithm is completely automated and spits out the Dream team that maximizes the probability of scoring the highest points. <br/>
<strong>b.</strong> In addition to that, it also conveys the estimated points that can be accrued through the selected team. The value would help us check the accuracy of the system.<br/>
<strong>c.</strong> The algorithm is sensitive to player performance trends and it adjusts accordingly.</p>
<p><strong>Enhancements -</strong> <br/>
<strong>a.</strong> The input data needs to be stored in a database. Currently, I am relying on manual efforts to fetch the required data. <br/>
<strong>b.</strong> The algorithm is not sensitive to injury news and other team updates. This is a significant miss and we will have to rely on scrapping and detecting such information through NLP on sports websites. It is an open-ended question.<br/></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
